data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,297,332 lost in Tyumen' that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tyumen‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Tyumen‘, Russia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 19,268 believers living in Tyumen‘, Russia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tyumen‘, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tobol-Irtysh Tatar, Siberian people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tyumen‘, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Tyumen' a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the state of Tyumen‘, Russia has a population of 1,316,600.

We estimate Tyumen' has 19,268 people who might know Jesus, 738,984 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 558,348 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Tyumen‘, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
